title: LeeBet
author: LeeBet
created_time: April 18, 2023, 08:54:19 AMLast edit: June 30, 2023, 01:28:19 PM by LeeBet

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Hi welcome to this forum, as I can see you're already correct for using BBcode to attach an image, but since you're still a newbie you need to buy a copper membership [1] because a newbie rank can't post an image.Your casino are still under development because there are many information like terms of service not yet appeared, but for the first impression it looks good for me.I will quote your message to make anyone can see it.Quote from: LeeBet on April 18, 2023, 08:54:19 AM[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on April 18, 2023, 09:04:39 AMI will quote your message to make anyone can see it.His message doesn't really represent anything. He only sent a link that is an end to itself and doesn't lead anywhere only the front or cover photo. I think he could make a write up for users to know what this is all about or what he wants. He is rather in a haste if they have not finished the work of which he is posting the cover page. Moreover, he should understand having a newbie account under a casino is not always sellable on the platform because of trust, except he is affiliated with reputable casino or can prove the trust. It is not always proper for a user to do a preliminary search on what a promoter wants. I see this is about igaming platform but you need to do a good PR .

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: It's funny to think you are posting here and still need to register on the website or make one. Are you sure you are the owner of it or something? Someone could purchase that domain and you would be out of business already. I hoped you had made some effort to post here rather than just an image we cannot see. This is a forum and you need to input texts etc.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: @OP welcome to this forum,I'm interested to know how your daily dividend token work, you wrote we can gain 4% daily from leebet.io profit in a stable coin. Does leebet token is a stable coin? and how you can be transparent to show your daily profit to everyone?Quote from: Oshosondy on April 18, 2023, 09:27:00 AMLeeBet.io is not even yet a registered domainYou're googled leebit.io, not leebet.io You need to be careful if you want to log in into your account, I see that you're careless and you could get phished from this silly fault.

comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on April 18, 2023, 09:27:00 AMLeeBet.io is not even yet a registered domainIt's called LeeBet with 'e', your screenshot is posted for LeeBit with 'i'.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.created_time: April 18, 2023, 10:21:19 AMLast edit: April 18, 2023, 10:42:58 AM by piebeyb
comments.body: $100k is a great prize and of course people will be tempted by that prize pool but more importantly I want to try the Limbo game there but it says "Soon", I have to wait patiently because this site is not fully open and released just register as a list white and waiting for the quiz with prizes, as long as it's free there's no harm in trying and participating, it's nice to hear that a new gambling platform is coming to this forum and of course we welcome all of them let alone make the announcement thread well.I also see that there is a Lee Token that can be obtained for free just by playing on this site, I will see the progress of this project, don't hesitate to provide any updates about promotions or about the development of your site. comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Your announcement topic is linked to the imgbb code which should be replaced by your website link. Fix that. I was just trying to check the site through clicking the image and realized you used the exact url/code you had from imgbb.It should be-Code:[url=yoursitelink][img]https://i.ibb.co/WfQMQRQ/Grand-Opening-event.png[/img][/url]Also, images seem broken. Feel free to reach out me to get these fixed. I can help you fixing all these and have an organized topic.My telegram- @LT_Mouse

comments.author: Haunebu
comments.body: Firstly, I have no idea why the image doesn't redirect to the site itself. Had to manually search for it like the others making it a hassle due to which my first impressions of this site are poor.Secondly, this site is clearly still in its alpha stages which should have been specified in the title itself.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: @LeeBet, You have typed the banner link in the main post instead of the domain of your casino. You should update it quickly ('Little Mouse' has already said about it above). I just registered an account in LeeBet, but I couldn't find out the login option. Then I checked the messages in LeeBet telegram group and found that the casino hasn't been launched officially yet. It will be launched on 2nd May. You should update this information in your main post.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I admit that the picture is good enough to be a kind of announcement from a website. But unfortunately, there is no description or other information about the casino site, so many of us are waiting for more info.But I agree that it seems that the casino is still developing because the gambling games are still classic gambling games that exist in almost all casinos. Hopefully, @OP can come back soon and provide a more detailed explanation.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Is this a mistake?I mean this:QuoteRegister before the launch and get an additional 0.05 USDT as a bonusProbably you mean BTC or what? 0.05 USDT is nothing.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on April 18, 2023, 10:38:34 AMIs this a mistake?I mean this:QuoteRegister before the launch and get an additional 0.05 USDT as a bonusProbably you mean BTC or what? 0.05 USDT is nothing.$0.05 is like a free spin.With a bonus program, I think it is more reasonable if it is $5 bonus or even bigger. Prize pool is big enough and caps at $8000 so I expect to have bigger bonus value for Leebet users.I agree with you that it is like a typo and if it is, the Leebet team should fix it as soon as possible. First to avoid confusion on their users. Second to avoid fud and impacts on their reputation.Bonus program should be managed well with clear terms and with good detective tools to check cheaters.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: OP is calling this an I-gaming platform, but as far as I can see, this platform offers regular casino/gambling games(dice, crash, coinflip).What is it then? Is it an I-gaming platform or a gambling platform? We have to clarify this, because there's a big difference between gaming and gambling? Anyway, the giveaways/bonuses at the launch of this platform seem to be just way too generous. Almost too good to be true. What's the point of joining a Telegram bot and answering a bunch of question in order to receive a prize?OP should post here the questions, which the participants must answer, in order to get a reward.Good luck with this project, OP(I'm assuming that OP, who started this forum thread is the owner of this project, but I might be wrong).

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I visited the site, LeeBet.io and I wanted to register, but before I can register, I like to read the terms of service. After I click on register, I click on terms of service, it brought up an error, that the page is not existing.I hope we are going to be able to read the terms of service very soon because I can not register on a site that does not have terms of service.

comments.author: ufaiz50
comments.body: Welcome to the forum Leebet! When is the opening of your website? I see that you offer some good reward  is this your grand opening? I checked that you have a lot of good games in your site and I think you also have NFT but it seems that we can't play yet? I was hoping that we can play soon so I could check and review your games.
